<h2>Version v1.0.2 - 10/20/2023</h2>

<h3>What's Changed</h3>
<p><span style="font-size: 1.2rem;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<h4><strong>Bug Fixes</strong></h4>
<p>- Fixed Apprentice ownership. Fixes #1</p>
<p>- Fixed dismiss button not working. Fixes #2</p>

<h4><strong>Features</strong></h4>
<p>- NPCs slowly gain XP while following the player</p>
<p>- NPCs now attack their master's attacker (or target). Fixes #5</p>
